messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
This karate man’s going to pulverize
you!
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
It’s obvious I need to train myself
and my Pokémon harder.Hey, if you’ve got a Vs. Seeker, you’d
better put it to good use.Nothing beats some repeated battling
for toughening up your Pokémon.
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
This karate man hasn’t forgotten
being pulverized by you!
